entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 1 this morning then steady. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 this morning then steady. Wind chill minus 8 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 20 February 2023
